channel.title: MRI on Getting Started
channel.description: Recent content in MRI on Getting Started

item.author: alejandro.moralesmartinez@ucsf.edu (Alejandro Morales Martinez)
item.description: MRI Resources Helpful introductions to MRI physics, image formation, image artifacts and terminology. Albert Einstein College of Medicine Introductory Series Peder Larson Group Siemens: MRI Physics MRI Acquisition and Artifacts MRI Glossary MRI Acronyms

item.author: alejandro.moralesmartinez@ucsf.edu (Alejandro Morales Martinez)
item.description: UCSF Research Imaging Systems MR Scanners and Equipment To schedule scanner time, check the MB3T7T Outlook calendar and ask Dan Vigneron or Peder Larson about open slots. GE 3T: used for most clinical studies, all hyperpolarized studies, some preclinical studies. See MRI technologist for available coil and phantom setups. GE 7T: used for mostly brain studies
